Detailed Description

Interfaces for block cipher encryption and decryption.

The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Mutable, Inc.
Portions created by Mutable, Inc. are

Definition in file ICipher.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum DRMPlugin::EncMethod
 

Encryption methods.

Enumeration values:
NULLENC  No encryption.
AES128CBC  AES with 128-bit key in CBC mode encryption.
AES128CTR  AES with 128-bit key in CTR mode encryption.
AES128ICM  AES with 128-bit key in ICM mode encryption.
BLOWFISH  Blowfish encryption.
